name: port only
description: Just port part of Ip address
content:
Verifies if a string looks like a ip address.
Note that "look-like" does not mean "is".
Some examples:

10.1.1.1
10.1.2.3:53635

1.2.3.4:1

1.2.3.4:
1.2.3.4:1234567890
555.555.000.666
999.999.999.999:99999

1::2
[::1]:13
author: Russell JohnBaptiste
